message.add_to_home_screen_first: First things first: add to Home screen.

step.ios: Launch with "Safari" => Tap the "Share" icon at the bottom of the screen (a box with an upward-pointing arrow) => Tap "Add to Home screen"
step.android: Launch with "Chrome" => Tap the menu icon (3 dots in upper right-hand corner) => Tap "Add to Home screen".

message.password_usage: Setup password to protect your Visit Records.
